moveDown(Cell) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Returns the cell below c on the board If the working cell is on the last row (no cell below) : returns null
moveDownLeft(Cell) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Returns the cell at the bottom left of c on the board Returns null if no cell can answer the query
moveDownRight(Cell) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Returns the cell at the bottom right of c on the board Returns null if no cell can answer the query
moveLeft(Cell) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Return the Cell just before c in terms of 'absolute' position If the working cell is the first cell of the row (no cell on the left) : return null
moveRight(Cell) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Returns the Cell just after c in terms of 'absolute' position If the working cell is the last cell on the row (no cell on the right) : returns null
moveUp(Cell) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Returns the Cell above c on the board If the working cell is on the first row (no cell on the top) : returns null
moveUpLeft(Cell) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Returns the cell at the top left of c on the board Returns null if no cell can answer the query
moveUpRight(Cell) - Method in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Returns the cell at the top right of c on the board Returns null if no cell can answer the query
